name: metmuseum-mcp_list-departments
description: List all departments in the Metropolitan Museum of Art (Met Museum)

name: metmuseum-mcp_search-museum-objects
description: Search for objects in the Metropolitan Museum of Art (Met Museum). Will return Total objects found, followed by a list of Object Ids.The parameter title should be set to true if you want to search for objects by title.The parameter hasImages is false by default, but can be set to true to return objects without images.If the parameter hasImages is true, the parameter title should be false.

q.description: The search query, Returns a listing of all Object IDs for objects that contain the search query within the object's data

hasImages.description: Only returns objects that have images

title.description: This should be set to true if you want to search for objects by title

departmentId.description: Returns objects that are in the specified department. The departmentId should come from the 'list-departments' tool.

name: metmuseum-mcp_get-museum-object
description: Get a museum object by its ID, from the Metropolitan Museum of Art Collection

objectId.description: The ID of the museum object to retrieve

returnImage.description: Whether to return the image (if available) of the object and add it to the server resources
